title: UAE Names Cobblestone Dream Team for Tadej Pogačar’s Paris-Roubaix Raid
content:
UAE to unleash classics beasts Politt, Vermeersch to support world champion Tadej Pogačar in Sunday's Paris-Roubaix debut: 'We have a very strong team.'

Read the full article at UAE Names Cobblestone Dream Team for Tadej Pogačar’s Paris-Roubaix Raid on Velo.
author: ahood
